name: Anti-Matter Arcade
description:
As the chief technicians proud assistant, it is your task to protect the energy core from anti-matter particles and push them into their corresponding energy chambers ... or else everything will blow up!

Use the blue gatekeeper to push these particles and always remember: Mix the colors! Pink goes green and green goes pink! Never push a green particle in the green chamber or a pink one in the pink chamber !! We even color coded them this way so it is easier for you to understand !!!

I really don't get why so many of these reactors explode ...

(Made with Godot for Score Jam #23 in 4h. Played with mouse/finger only)

Music and Sounds from:

  • https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6
  • https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/sound-effects-search.php?q=game
